simplified_text:
The studies I mention focus on something called deliberate practice. This is similar to what we mean by deep work. For what we're talking about, deliberate practice is a great example of the tough mental tasks that deep work includes. 

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The passage discusses studies on deliberate practice, which is closely related to deep work. It highlights that deliberate practice serves as a good example of challenging mental tasks that deep work involves.
